Reece G. Gilbert

Full Stack Web Developer

About Me

A programmer and full stack web developer with a passion for practical software.

I have a personal interest in FOSS software, linux, terminal workflows, vim etc.

Also interested in DevOps, web security, and database/server administration.

Portfolio

Below is a list of my major and minor projects.

The focus of and technologies used in the project are listed with them.

No Demo Avaliable

Hay and Straw Company Management

A laravel web app for managing various parts of the business. Users of 5 differnt types (admin, sales, office, transport, supplier) can log in and interact with order/transport/etc information relevant to them.

Featues

  • Manage orders from creation to billing with input from transport companies as they deliver loads.
  • Interactive main order display with various filtering and sorting options (user type specific). Aswell as misc features such as expanding orders in the list, progressing stage with a single click, and entering certain information directly from the list.
  • Interactive order form with various search/select, autofill, and autocalc functionality.
  • Store customer information with multiple billing addresses, devivery addresses, and address alternative contacts.
  • Manage products, stock locations, stock levels, and stock history.
  • Automatic stock tracking as orders are processed.
  • Suppliers can login to view load information for load picked up directly from them.
  • Transport staff can login and interact with loads asigned to there respective company.

Development & Deployment

  • Laravel/PHP backend. Vue w/ Sass frontend. Compiled/bundled with laravel mix, webpack, babel.
  • Developed locally using containerized Apache web-sever, mysql database, phpMyAdmin. Each run in there own docker container and managed with docker-compose (and a docker compose .yml file).
  • Developed in a terminal based enviroment that could be loaded in seconds with a single command (using tmux, tmuxp, docker, and docker-compose, npm scripts and vim).
  • Developed closely following the git Gitflow workflow.

The site is hosted on a digital ocean VPS that I setup with a LAMP stack. Updates are deployed via merging to the master branch were they are cloned and built on the VPS.
